Blog Posts

Set title for JFace dialog

Posted on 12 May 2011 by Andy

The following snippet sets the title for a JFace dialog:

@Override
protected void configureShell(Shell shell) {
    super.configureShell(shell);
    shell.setText("My Dialog Title");
}

However the following error might occur:

This can be resolved if you change the setting from “error” to “warning” in the Eclipse preferences.

Tagged: JFace Dialog Set Title SetTitle and setTitle by Andy

Get plugin path

Posted on 28 April 2011 by Andy

This snippets gets the local folder for a plugin:

public static File getPluginFolder() {
    if(pluginFolder == null) {
        URL url = Platform.getBundle("my.plugin.id").getEntry("/");
        try {
            url = Platform.resolve(url);
        }
        catch(IOException ex) {
            ex.printStackTrace();
        }
        pluginFolder = new File(url.getPath());
    }

    return pluginFolder;
}

Tagged: Plugin folder eclipse by Andy
